Zomo ahụ oké onyibo bụ akwụkwọ 1992 nke Gerald McDermott dere nke dabeere n'akụkọ ọdịnala Naijiria nke na-akọwa ihe mere oké onyibo ji agba ọsọ ngwa ngwa kali anụmanụ ndị ọzọ.

Booklist, na nyocha kpakpando nke Zomo ahụ oké oyibo, dere "N'ụzọ dị egwu, juputara na slapstick na mischief, mbipụta a nke akụkọ aghụghọ Naijiria na-adịgide adịgide bụ ihe na'anya nke onye na na - akụkọ
" na School Library Journal dere, "Site na odi obere dike ya na onye mmeri na ya yi uwe na okpu mara mma na isi, atụmatụ ya dị mma, yana nnukwu ọchị ya, akụkọ a ga-abụ ihe ụtọ iji ụmụaka".
Publishers Weekly kpọrọ ya "ịkọwa ihe ziri ezi" wee dee "ihe ọdé gouache nke McDermott na ụcha fuchsia, kọwaa ndụ akwụkwọ nri na oroma na-olotara agba na akara geometric nke akwa West Afrịka".
